name: Little Party
description:
LITTLE PARTY IS A SHORT STORY VIDEO GAME ABOUT

YOUR DAUGHTER'S ALL-NIGHTER PARTY.

[Controls]

Arrow Keys: Move
Space Bar: Get Involved / Look Down

Music is a key element here. Keep the volume up!

(Note: If the screen seems cut off, you may need to hold alt at start-up and change the resolution. I'm sorry about that I'm working on a fix!)

[By]
Carter Lodwick (https://twitter.com/carterlod)
Ian Endsley (https://twitter.com/iendsl)

[Music]
Scott Archer (http://scottdavidarcher.bandcamp.com/)
Marissa Deitz Wall (http://thevale.bandcamp.com/)
Brian Scott (https://soundcloud.com/commonstomper)

[Additional Modeling & "Dog Game" Animation]

Thank You!
